column4: Diversity (Global) – DIVG1 Identify issues – Students will articulate knowledge and understanding of local, regional, national, and global issues and the interconnectedness and interdependency of human populations.
column11: Advanced: Demonstrate a sophisticated and multi-layered ability  to identify local, regional, national and global diversity  issues along with the interconnectedness and  interdependency of human populations.
column13: Proficient: Demonstrate an advanced ability to identify local, regional, national and global diversity issues along with the interconnectedness and interdependency of human populations.
column15: Progressing: Demonstrate a basic ability to identify local, regional, national and global diversity issues along with the interconnectedness and interdependency of human populations.
column17: Beginning: Demonstrate a partial ability to identify local, regional,  national and global diversity issues along with the  interconnectedness and interdependency of human  populations.
column19: Unsatisfactory: Demonstrates little ability to identify local, regional,  national and global diversity issues along with the  interconnectedness and interdependency of human  populations.
